snippet.title: SpellRogue: Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page:   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990110/SpellRogue/

SpellRogue is a turn-based dice roguelike where you roll Mana Dice, spend them to cast powerful spells, gain legendary artifacts, upgrade your spells and experiment with potent combinations to annihilate your foes.



The game is in ‘open development’ on our Discord server, where we pull back the curtains and discuss design, balance and post teasers for our audience. SpellRogue is already a very engaging experience and we share new early builds about every 3-4 weeks, just enough time for us to make major improvements!

So join us and try out the game, give us feedback and help us make SpellRogue the best that it can be!

Learn more on our Socials
Discord      - https://discord.com/invite/5AnXVPCqyx
Twitter       - https://twitter.com/Spellrogue
Webpage   - https://www.spellrogue.com/




LEGAL:
Music: "Trailer" & "Highland Song" by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
